description: US President Donald Trump is expected to dine with 220 holders of the "Official Trump" token at a golf course in Virginia on May 22. Justin Sun, the owner of the Tron blockchain, is among the VIP attendees of this gala dinner.
title: Trump Memecoin Holders Set to Dine With US President, Tron Founder Justin Sun Confirms Attendance

description: Amazon is reportedly developing a foldable tablet, that could compete with a similar device said to be in development at Apple, according to analyst Ming-Chi Kuo. This news follows Huawei's launch of its MateBook Fold Ultimate, featuring an 18-inch screen that folds into the shape of a 13-inch laptop.
title: Amazon Working on Large Foldable Device Similar to Huawei MateBook Fold Ultimate: Ming-Chi Kuo

description: Google I/O 2025 keynote session on Tuesday was focused on new artificial intelligence (AI) updates and features. Alongside, the Mountain View-based tech giant also introduced a new tool to bring more transparency when it comes to AI-generated content. Dubbed SynthID Detector, it is an under-testing verification portal which can detect and identify multimodal AI content made using the company’s AI models.
title: Google Announces SynthID Detector That Can Identify Gemini-Generated Content at Google I/O 2025

description: Infinix GT 30 Pro 5G was launched in select global markets on Wednesday. The gaming-focused smartphone is equipped with shoulder triggers, XBoost Gaming Engine and an AI-backed VC cooling system. The handset has an IP64-rated dust and splash-resistant build and a 108-megapixel main rear camera. It is powered by the MediaTek Dimensity 8350 Ultimate SoC and packs a 5,500mAh battery with 45W wired fast charging support.
title: Infinix GT 30 Pro 5G With MediaTek Dimensity 8350 Ultimate SoC, 5,500mAh Battery Launched: Price, Features

description: Google announced a multitude of artificial intelligence (AI) updates and new features at I/O 2025 on Tuesday. Alongside, the company also shared its long-term vision with AI, and the way it wants to evolve its current line of AI products. Demis Hassabis, the Co-Founder and CEO of Google DeepMind, highlighted the new developments with Project Astra and Project Mariner, as well as the tech giant’s plans with Gemini Robotics.
title: Google Outlines Vision for Universal AI Assistant, Expands Project Astra and Project Mariner

description: A stablecoin bill was passed in Hong Kong on Wednesday. Christopher Hui, the city's secretary for financial services and the treasury, said this step laid a solid foundation for Hong Kong's virtual asset market.
title: Hong Kong Passes stablecoin Bill, One Step Closer to Issuance

description: iQOO Watch 5 smartwatch and TWS Air 3 wireless earbuds have been launched in China. The new devices were announced alongside the iQOO Neo 10 Pro+ and iQOO Pad 5 on Tuesday. The iQOO Watch 5 has a 1.43-inch AMOLED display, and is advertised to deliver a maximum 22 days of battery life on a single charge. The TWS Air 3 boast 12mm dynamic drivers and have an IP54-rated build.
title: iQOO Watch 5 With 1.43-Inch AMOLED Display and TWS Air 3 With Up to 45 Hours of Total Battery Life Launched

description: Realme Buds Air 7 Pro were unveiled in China in April. The TWS earphones will soon be available in global markets, including India. Realme has confirmed the design, colour options, and key features of the audio wearables. Notably, the global variant will come with slightly different specifications than its Chinese counterpart.
title: Realme Buds Air 7 Pro Global Launch Set for May 27; Colours, Key Features Revealed

description: WhatsApp co-founder Brian Acton said that the messaging app had no plans to compete with Facebook. Acton was present at a federal courthouse in Washington to testify in the ongoing US Federal Trade Commission’s antitrust trial against Meta Platforms.
title: WhatsApp Had No Plans to Compete With Facebook, Co-Founder Says

description: Qualcomm and Xiaomi have extended their collaboration with a new multi-year agreement. Xiaomi's upcoming premium smartphones will feature Qualcomm's flagship Snapdragon chips. Xiaomi's current Xiaomi 15 flagship phone already uses the Snapdragon 8 Elite, and the company has confirmed its next flagship will be among the first to adopt Qualcomm's next high-end Snapdragon chip.
title: Xiaomi to Equip Premium Smartphones With Snapdragon 8-Series Chips as Part of Multi-Year Agreement

description: CyberPowerPC India has announced a new campaign which aims to make the PC buying experience a more transparent one. With ‘Play Guarantee’, the Indian arm of the US-based retailer provides assurance to buyers that their purchased custom PCs will be built using brand-new, genuine parts sourced from authorised manufacturers. As part of this initiative, the company also promises one year of on-site support with certified technicians assigned for repairs or replacements.
title: CyberPowerPC India Announces ‘Play Guarantee’ for a Transparent Buying Experience

description: Alcatel V3 5G series is set to launch in India on May 27. The Alcatel V3 Ultra 5G model was already confirmed to arrive as part of the lineup. Now, the French mobile brand, operated by TCL Communication, has officially teased the Alcatel V3 Pro 5G and V3 Classic 5G variants. The design, colour options and key features of the upcoming smartphones have been revealed ahead of their launch.
title: Alcatel V3 Pro 5G, V3 Classic 5G Teased Ahead of May 27 India Launch

description: AMD Ryzen Threadripper 9000 series has been unveiled at Computex 2025 as AMD's latest high-performance processors. The most powerful model is the Ryzen Threadripper PRO 9995WX, which has 96 cores and a 5.4GHz peak clock speed. AMD also launched the Radeon RX 9060 XT and Radeon AI PRO R9700 GPUs, with up to 16GB and 32GB VRAM, respectively.
title: AMD Ryzen Threadripper 9000 Series Processors Launched Alongside Radeon RX 9060 XT, Radeon AI PRO R9700 GPUs

description: Google has released the Android 16 QPR1 Beta 1 update for eligible Google Pixel users. Unlike early previews and beta versions of major Android updates, the Quarterly Platform Release builds are said to be stable and ready for everyday use. This update includes elements from the Material 3 Expressive design language, which was unveiled earlier this month. It comes with visual refreshments for notifications, quick settings, the lock screen, as well as the launcher.
title: Android 16 Release: Everything You Can Expect from Google’s Upcoming OS Update

description: Asus ExpertBook P3 series launched on Tuesday at Computex 2025. The new lineup includes 14-inch and 16-inch models, both featuring an AMD Ryzen AI 7 350 processor and up to 32GB of RAM. These business-oriented laptops are equipped with a 1080p camera supporting Windows Hello for biometric authentication, and a 70Wh battery that can be charged at 65W via USB Type-C port.
title: Asus ExpertBook P3 Series With AMD Ryzen AI 7 350 Processor Launched at Computex 2025

description: Doom: The Dark Ages has become the “biggest launch” in developer ID Software’s history, Bethesda announced Wednesday. The publisher confirmed that the first-person shooter had crossed three million players, but did not share initial sales figures.
title: Doom: The Dark Ages Crosses 3 Million Players, Becoming ID Software's 'Biggest Launch' Ever

description: Google hosted the keynote session of its I/O 2025 developer conference on Tuesday. During the session, company CEO Sundar Pichai and other executives announced a plethora of new artificial intelligence (AI) updates and features. Some of these include new capabilities in the Gemini 2.5 series of AI models, updates to AI Mode in Search, and expansion of AI Overviews.
title: Google I/O 2025: Everything Announced From Gemini 2.5, AI Mode to Project Astra

description: Google previewed Wear OS 6 at the Google I/O 2025 on Tuesday, introducing a significant visual overhaul with the new Material 3 Expressive design language. The update will bring new colours, animations and buttons to smartwatches. The tech giant has also released the first developer preview of Wear OS 6, based on Android 16.
title: Google Rolling Out Wear OS 6 Developer Preview With Material 3 Expressive Design

description: Google unveiled the next generation of its image and video generation artificial intelligence (AI) models on Tuesday at the I/O 2025 event. Dubbed Imagen 4 and Veo 3, these multimodal AI models arrive with new capabilities and upgrades over their predecessors. While Imagen 4 features faster generation times and improved text rendering, Veo 3 gets native audio generation capability and can integrate background sound and dialogues in generated videos.
title: Google Unveils Video-Generation Model Veo 3 and Image Generation Model Imagen 4 at Google I/O 2025

description: HP OmniStudio X was launched in India on Wednesday. The all-in-one (AIO) PC is powered by Intel Core Ultra 7 processor with Arc Graphics, paired with 32GB of RAM and 1TB of SSD storage. The company has equipped the computer with Intel AI Boost NPU which, along with the CPU, claims to deliver 47 tera operations per second (TOPS) of computational power.  HP OmniStudio X features a 31.5-inch 4K resolution IPS screen, dual speakers, a 5-megapixel infrared (IR) webcam, and Wi-Fi 7 connectivity.
title: HP OmniStudio X All-in-One PC With Intel Core Ultra 7 CPU Launched in India: Price, Specifications

description: Oppo Reno 14 series was unveiled in China last week and they're expected to be available in select global markets soon. The Reno 14 global versions will come with integrated Google Gemini features, the company has confirmed. The Chinese variants of the phones run on Android 15-based ColorOS 15 out-of-the-box, sport 1.5K flat OLED screens and are claimed to meet IP66+IP68+IP69 dust and water-resistant ratings.
title: Oppo Reno 14 Series Confirmed to Launch Globally With Integrated Google Gemini Features

description: Sony Bravia 2 II series was launched in India on Tuesday. The new TV lineup is powered by Google TV OS and sports 4K Ultra HD screens, powered by the proprietary 4K X-Reality Pro picture engine. As per the company, they are offered in multiple display size options with narrow bezels. The Sony Bravia 2 II series TVs come with support for HDR and HLG for picture enhancement. These visual technologies are complemented by Dolby Atmos and DTS:X audio features.
title: Sony Bravia 2 II Series With X1 Picture Processor and Google TV OS Launched in India: Price, Specifications

description: We've rounded up the top 4 Windows 11 laptops that will not only handle everything you throw at them but also look incredibly stylish while doing it.
title: Top 4 Windows 11 Laptops to Future-Proof Your Productivity

description: Xiaomi 16 is expected to go official in the last quarter of this year as a successor to last year's Xiaomi 15. As we wait for the official launch, a leaked Computer-aided design (CAD) render of the handsets hints at its design. The Xiaomi 16 is seen with a triple rear camera unit in the leaked render. The overall look of the phone appears similar to its predecessor, but the leak points to a dual-tone design.
title: Xiaomi 16 Early Render Shows Dual Tone Design, Triple Rear Cameras

description: Epic Games' Fortnite game has returned on Apple's App Store in the US from Tuesday. Launched in 2017, Fortnite became an instant hit, drawing millions of players around the world thanks to its last-player-standing, "battle royale" format.
title: Epic Games' Fortnite Returns to Apple App Store in US After Nearly Five Years

description: Stellar Blade, the action game from Korean developer Shift Up, is getting a sequel. Days after announcing the PC version of the game, the studio quietly revealed its plans for the franchise at its latest quarterly earnings call.
title: Stellar Blade Sequel Confirmed by Shift Up, Launch Planned Before 2027

description: Tesla will begin a test of its long-promised robotaxi service on schedule in Austin, Texas, by the end of June. CEO Elon Musk has said he will reduce his work for the Trump administration and focus on his EV company.
title: Tesla on Track to Launch Robotaxi Trial in Austin, Texas, by June End, Musk Says

description: Amazon Prime Air service, which drops packages by drone within 60 minutes or less of being ordered, took flight a few years back. Today, the tech giant announced that it will start delivering a new range of devices through drones in select regions. Amazon has received regulatory approval to deliver new categories of devices, including iPhone models, other Apple products, and Galaxy smartphones.
title: Amazon's Drones Can Now Deliver New Categories of Devices Like iPhone, AirPods and More

description: The overall crypto market cap rose by 0.87 percent in the last 24 hours. Bitcoin and Ether, both registered profits on Wednesday, May 21. Dogecoin, Tron, and Avalanche registered gains. Meanwhile, Ripple joined Cardano and Chainlink in clocking losses.
title: Bitcoin Surges Past $107,000 for First Time Since January as Altcoins Rally

description: Google announced significant upgrades to Gmail, Google Workspace, Google Docs, and even Google Vids during the annual Google I/O Developers Conference on Tuesday. One of the biggest highlights was the rollout of new Gemini features for Gmail. Google has added new personalised replies in Gmail with help from Gemini. This allows users to draft their emails through AI suggestions that match their specific context and tone
title: Google Unveils New Workspace Features at I/O for Meet, Docs, Vids; Gmail Gets Personalised Smart Replies

description: Infinix GT 30 Pro is scheduled to be launched in India and global markets soon. Ahead of its anticipated debut, alleged live images of the Infinix GT 20 Pro successor have surfaced suggesting its design elements and colourways. The handset is speculated to come with RGB lighting with one of its colour options, while another one could sport a silver LED matrix. All GT 3 Pro variants will reportedly feature the Cyber Mecha Design 2.0.
title: Infinix GT 30 Pro Leaked Images Suggest RGB Lighting, Colour Options Ahead of Global Debut

description: The second season of America’s Sweethearts: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders premieres on Netflix June 18, 2025. Directed by Greg Whiteley, the docuseries explores the rigorous journey of DCC hopefuls and veterans. Season 1 was a breakout hit, earning top rankings and millions of views in its debut week.
title: America's Sweethearts: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders Season 2 OTT Release Date Announced

description: Thomas Vinterberg’s Families Like Ours is a highly anticipated Danish miniseries making its global streaming debut on Netflix on June 10, 2025. Set against the backdrop of a climate-induced crisis in Denmark, it tells the story of Laura, a teen grappling with separation and belonging.
title: Family Like Ours OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch Danish Drama Online?

description: The international spy thriller Inheritance, starring Phoebe Dynevor, begins streaming in India on May 23 via Lionsgate Play. Directed by Neil Burger and co-written with Olen Steinhauer, the film explores themes of family secrets and global espionage. After its theatrical release earlier this year, it now reaches a broader audience through its OTT debut.
title: Inheritance OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch Spy Thriller Movie Online?

description: iQOO Pad 5 series was launched in China alongside the iQOO Neo 10 Pro+ on Tuesday. The lineup includes a base and a Pro variant. They run on OriginOS 5, based on Android 15 out-of-the-box and support up to 512GB of UFS 4.1 storage. The base iQOO Pad 5 comes with a MediaTek Dimensity 9300+ SoC, while a MediaTek Dimensity 9400+ chipset powers the Pad 5 Pro.
title: iQOO Pad 5 Pro With MediaTek Dimensity 9400+ SoC Launched Alongside iQOO Pad 5

description: Night Swim is an American horror movie that features Wyatt Russell and Kerry Condon in the lead roles. The plot follows the Walker family, who move to a new house, post-retirement of Ray Walker (Wyatt Russell) from baseball. However, what they are unaware of is the presence of a sinister force awaiting them in the backyard pool of their house. How will they escape it? Will they survive? Watch this spine-chilling movie, only on Netflix.
title: Night Swim Now Streaming on Netflix: Everything You Need To Know about American Horror Movie

description: Retro is a Tamil Action-Romance drama film which stars Suirya and Pooja Hegde in the lead roles. The movie follows the life of a gangster who has taken a vow to leave his past behind and move forward towards leading a peaceful life. However, the film gets intense when he finds himself stuck between his past and the vow to his wife. Streaming starts from June 5th, 2025, only on Netflix.
title: Retro OTT Release Reportedly Revealed: When and Where to Watch it Online?

description: Google showed off its Android XR Glasses at Tuesday's annual Google I/O Developers Conference in California. Developed through an expanded partnership with Samsung, these AI-powered glasses add Gemini to smart glasses. Google is also working with eyewear brands like Gentle Monster and Warby Parker to design the new smart glasses. They feature a live language translation feature and boast speakers.
title: Google Previews Gemini-Powered Android XR Glasses at I/O With Live Language Translation Feature

description: Google is rebranding its Project Starline and turning it into a 3D video communication platform, the company announced at its annual developer conference on Tuesday. Dubbed Beam, the platform enables users to connect with each other in a more intuitive manner by turning 2D video streams into 3D experiences. It leverages the Google Cloud platform along with the company’s AI prowess to deliver enterprise-grade reliability and compatibility with the existing workflow.
title: Google Introduces Beam, an AI-Driven Communication Platform That Turns 2D Video Into 3D Experiences

description: Google showcased several new features for the Gemini 2.5 family of artificial intelligence (AI) models at the Google I/O 2025 on Tuesday. The Mountain View-based tech giant introduced an enhanced reasoning mode dubbed Deep Think, which is powered by the Gemini 2.5 Pro model. It also unveiled a new, natural and human-like speech called Native Audio Output, which will be available via the Live application programming interface (API).
title: Google I/O 2025: Gemini 2.5 AI Models Upgraded With Deep Think Mode, Native Audio Output

description: Google is expanding its AI Overviews feature to over 200 countries along with broadening support for more languages, the company announced during the keynote of its I/O 2025 developer conference held in California on Tuesday. With this update, the AI-powered search tool will now be available in Arabic, Chinese, Malay, Urdu, and more languages, enabling users to see text in the local languages of each of their respective countries and get a quick overview of the topic.
title: Google Expands AI Overviews to Over 200 Countries in More Than 40 Languages
